articles.title: „Sound der Selbstkritiklosigkeit“ bei der Union? Da hat Habeck einfach recht
articles.image_title: WON kombo Johannes Wiedemann 08.09.2022, Berlin: Robert Habeck (Bündnis 90/Die Grünen), Bundesminister für Wirtschaft und Klimaschutz, spricht im Bundestag in der Debatte zum Etat Wirtschaft und Klimaschutz. Foto: Michael Kappeler/dpa +++ dpa-Bildfunk +++
articles.author: Johannes Wiedemann

articles.title: Ausland
articles.image_title: BRUSSELS, BELGIUM - FEBRUARY 28: Czech Minister of Industry and Trade Jozef Sikela is talking to media in the Europa, the EU Council headquarter on February 28, 2022 in Brussels, Belgium. Following the invasion of Ukraine by Russian forces, EU energy ministers will convene in Brussels to discuss the current situation of the energy market in Europe. The Russian invasion of Ukraine has caused an increase in the price of gas in the EU and in global oil prices. This increase is happening in the context of a pre-existing spike in energy prices in the EU. (Photo by Thierry Monasse/Getty Images)

articles.title: So trauert die Welt um die Queen
articles.image_title: LONDON, UNITED KINGDOM - SEPTEMBER 08: Floral tributes on the gates of Buckingham Palace following the announcement of the death of Queen Elizabeth II in London, United Kingdom on September 08, 2022. Buckingham Palace has announced today that Queen Elizabeth II has died peacefully at Balmoral at the age of 96. Wiktor Szymanowicz / Anadolu Agency
